content.rendered:
Request a Sample

We understand that purchasing 3D equipment such as a 3D printer or scanner is a big investment. You can read all the tech specs and white papers in the world and find yourself still scratching your head wondering what the product is capable of producing. Request a free sample to see the final product in the flesh and bridge the gap.

Just follow the links below and complete the form to request your free sample.

SLA 3D Print Sample

Request a Sample

FDM 3D Print Sample

Request a Sample

SLS 3D Print Sample

Request a Sample

Sample 3D Scan

Request a Sample
